content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup at positions (1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (1, 1) with coal as fuel and iron ore as input, producing iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position (3, 0) with coal as fuel and iron ore as input, producing iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to inventory updates
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you have enough resources before performing actions that require them, such as inserting into furnaces.
